name: beer-1
description: Brew Buddies is a hybrid review site and social media for lovers of beer, breweries, barley, and buddies. This application allows you to search nearby breweries and see user reviews, or take up a pen (so to speak) and write your own! You can also add breweries to your Favorites list, so no matter how good a time you have, you'll never forget your favorite hangout hops spots. If a review catches your eye, save it to your favorites so you can try it next Saturday night. You can also add Friends, who you might want to share a pint with. The site display is as fresh and fun as your favorite distillery pull. Please drink responsibly! Cheers! üçª

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
